title: Tropical circulation
creator_credit: Churchill Films and Institut für Film und Bild
brief_description: Examines the movement of air in tropical regions with some reference to polar areas. Explains how the rotations of the earth and the seasonal movements of the sun affect wind direction and rainfall in the tropical regions. No other credits available.
